mapper.insert: insert into board_tb(board_id, writer_id, writer_name, title, content, task_id) values(board_seq.nextval, #{writerId}, #{writerName}, #{title}, #{content}, #{taskId})
mapper.select: select board_id, writer_id, writer_name, title, content, to_char(board_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as board_date, task_id, M.profile from board_tb B left outer join member_tb M on B.writer_id = M.memberid where task_id = #{taskId} order by board_id
mapper.insert: insert into board_file(file_no, file_name_key, file_name, file_path, file_size, del_yn, ins_user_id, board_id) values(board_file_seq.nextval, #{fileNameKey}, #{fileName}, #{filePath}, #{fileSize}, #{delYN}, #{insUserId}, board_seq.currval)
